pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Modeling of Spatio-Temporal Data with R // Fits, validates and compares a number of Bayesian models for spatial and space time point referenced and areal unit data. Model fitting is done using several packages: 'rstan', 'INLA', 'spBayes', 'spTimer', 'spTDyn', 'CARBayes' and 'CARBayesST'. Model comparison is performed using the DIC and WAIC, and K-fold cross-validation where the user is free to select their own subset of data rows for validation. Sahu (2022) doi:10.1201/9780429318443 describes the methods in detail.
